column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We were warned it would be 45 minutes after you order to get your pizza. Â I would expect it to be perfect
column2: but it wasn't. Deep dish was not piping hot and neither was the thin crust. Flavors were good
column3: but just was not that hot. Server was great
column4: and place is cool. I see the charm just wasn't thrilled.
